chunk: Ingredients: ORGANIC SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA OIL), OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE OIL), PLEARGONIUM GRAVEOLENS (GERANIUM ESSENTIAL OIL), ORGANIC PASSIFLORA INCARNATA (PASSIONFLOWER), CANNABIS SATIVA OIL (HEMP OIL), CAMELLIA OLEIFERA SEED OIL, CALOPHYLLUM INOPHYLLUM (OIL OF TAMANU), HIPPOPHAE RHAMNOIDES (SEA BUCKTHORN OIL).

chunk: Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
